metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31485 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: GitLab::API::v4 through 0.26 does not verify TLS certificates when connecting to a GitLab server, enabling machine-in-the-middle attacks.

notes.Note: jslarraz> Fixing this issue may introduce a regression when this package is used to interact with self-managed GitLab servers using self-signed certificates.

criterions.comment: libgitlab-api-v4-perl package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
